name: _superusers
schema: CREATE TABLE `_superusers` (`created` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `email` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `emailVisibility` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL, `id` TEXT PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT ('r'||lower(hex(randomblob(7)))) NOT NULL, `password` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `tokenKey` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `updated` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `verified` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL)
